news.title: Megadeth to End After 2026 Album and Farewell Tour
news.summary: Dave Mustaine is saying goodbye to the thrash metal band he founded after being fired from Metallica in 1983

news.title: New Mixes From Frankie Knuckles, Andrew Weatherall, and More Unearthed for Resident Advisor Series: Listen
news.summary: There are also new tunes from Helena Hauff, Theo Parrish, and others to mark the 1,000th installment of the RA Podcast

news.title: Lana Del Rey Teases New Song Alluding to Ethel Cain Friction: Watch
news.summary: “Ethel Cain hated my Instagram post/Think it’s cute reenacting my Chicago pose,” she sings
